overview: This lovely teenager has a series of lewd ideas - being gang-banged, having sex with several guys at the same time, lesbian sex, oral sex, and so on. Her shrink advises her to get rid of these daydreams as he masturbates to them. Then he tells her to experience her fantasies in order to free herself.
tagline: Her conscience said no... but her budding body said yes... yes... yes!
title: Barbie's Fantasy
